<img src="http://inceptionhosting.com/logob.png" />

Hi Folks,

Seems to have been an age since I posted an offer here so I did a quick tally up of what I can let go on special offers and came up with a list.


**//////// USA \\\\\\\\**

Starting with the new **Xen HVM Miami Florida** Offers:

This is the only location/type that supports and offers BSD/Windows Media, license is not included (180 day fully unrestricted trial is) any other media made available on request.

4 x CPU Cores (E5-2620) equal share
2 GB 100% Dedicated Ram
45 GB Raid 10 Disk space (6 disk dedicated storage array)
1 TB Bandwidth @ gbit
1 x IPv4
5 x IPv6 (additional IPv6 free on request)
</pre>
**Price:** €5.00 p/month

**Order Link:** https://clients.inceptionhosting.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=89

**Network and Locations**
<pre>
UK-v4: 149.255.111.8
UK-V6: 2a03:ca80:8007::4ca8:da1
Servers with OpenITC in Rapidswitch DC

USA Phoenix: 199.231.84.66
Phoenix Servers with IOFlood in PhoenixNAP

USA Miami: 64.188.46.128 / 2607:f2e0:10f:f:1234:1234:5715:58dc
Miami Servers in coresite/Miami IX
</pre>

**General Notes**

<pre>
No TOR/Public Proxy No IRC Servers in USA (DC enforced port filtering in place for common IRC ports) absolutely no crypto currency mining.

No Bulk Mailing 

Servers are self managed by your expert fingers 

Payment via PayPal, BitPay or Moneybookers/Skrill 

Nodes are a mix on E3-1270(NL), X3470(Phoenix), E5-2620(Miami), E5630/45(UK) All Nodes are Raid 10 with either 4 or 8 disks.

2 Day refund policy in place, please read the terms, if you choose to set up a subscription payment it is your responsibility to maintain, any over payments are held as account credit.

CPU Cores are on an ----> equal share basis <---- , not dedicated, dedicated cores are €31 each p/month and only when available.
</pre>

Additionally there are still some €3.00 p/year http://LowEndSpirit.com OpenVZ servers available in Italy.

You get:

<pre>
128mb Ram
2GB Pure SSD Disk
500 GB DDOS protected premium bandwidth @ 100 mbit
6 x IPv6
1 x NAT IPv4
</pre>

Forther information available via the FAQ on the LES site or pop over to the forum for pre sales questions http://forum.lowendspirit.com

Thanks as always for reading, if anyone wants a custom quote let me know, VPS packages available up to 16GB Ram,
